short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove all _blank targets from all links on all pages. For those who prefer more control over how a link opens.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The _noblank extension removes all `target` attributes that contain "_blank" from all links on the page, allowing the user to decide whether to open a link in a new tab.

Open source, code here: https://github.com/whalderman/_noblank
